function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate adoption of preventive measures such as social distancing, hand hygiene, and wearing face masks","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and higher infection rates","Mitigation":"Education and public awareness campaigns, enforcement of preventive measures, and access to protective equipment","Technologies":"Digital communication tools for education and awareness, monitoring systems for enforcement","People":"General public, densely populated communities","Owner":"Health authorities, government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Debate over the effectiveness of wearing masks by the public","Impact":"Confusion and potential reduced adherence to preventive measures","Mitigation":"Clear and consistent communication of evidence-based guidelines, research on mask effectiveness, and public education","Technologies":"Digital media for information dissemination, research and data analysis tools","People":"General public, policymakers","Owner":"Health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Differing interpretations of the importance of preventive measures based on social and cultural context","Impact":"Varying levels of adoption of preventive measures, potential for outbreaks in specific communities","Mitigation":"Cultural sensitivity in public health messaging, collaboration with community leaders, and tailored interventions","Technologies":"Multilingual communication platforms, community engagement tools","People":"Diverse cultural and social communities","Owner":"Health authorities, community leaders, public health organizations"}]}
